text: Mitja, thank you very much for your message. That’s what I needed, it helped a lot! :+1:

So i’m trying to put some default content in a drag and drop module in my template, apparently it doesn’t support the escaping double quotes `\"` This is particularly annoying because that is exactly what is given if I copy and paste the module code from the page editor in dev mode. Will this be fixed?

e.g the content for a testimonial field

```{% dnd_module
					  path="/DD Theme 2/modules/content",
					  offset=0,
					  width=12,
					  columns=
[
    {"testimonial": {
                    "quote": "<div>\n<p>\"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam non pharetra nunc. Morbi diam diam, luctus a interdum ac, ullamcorper nec purus. Morbi et tortor convallis, molestie velit maximus, dictum erat. Etiam ullamcorper elementum ex at commodo.\"</p>\n</div>",
                }}]```
Does anyone know of a way to conditionally render a drag and drop column by default in a custom section in a custom template?
